Package dgantt

A simple yet powerful library for creating Gantt charts.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GanttModelListener Listener interface for receiving notifications when a GanttModel is changed.
GanttSelectionListener Listener interface for receiving notifications whenever the selected tasks in a Gantt chart are changed.
LinkRenderer Renderer for drawing links on a Gantt chart.
RowRenderer Renderer for drawing the background of a Gantt chart.
TaskRenderer Renderer for drawing tasks on a Gantt chart.
 

Class Summary
AdvancedTaskEditorHandler A more advanced task editor than BasicTaskEditorHandler, which demonstrates features like snapping tasks to day boundaries, adding edits to an UndoManager, etc.
BasicDoubleClickHandler Basic MouseAdapter for detecting when a task is double-clicked and displaying a text box allowing the text to be modified.
BasicGanttModel Basic GanttModel implementation where each task is placed on a separate row.
BasicLinkEditorHandler Basic MouseAdapter for adding links using the right-mouse button.
BasicLinkModel Basic LinkModel implementation.
BasicLinkRenderer A basic implementation of a LinkRenderer.
BasicRowRenderer A basic implementation of a RowRenderer.
BasicSelectionHandler Basic MouseAdapter for selecting multiple tasks in a Gantt chart.
BasicTaskEditorHandler Basic MouseAdapter for selecting, moving and resizing tasks.
BasicTaskRenderer A basic implementation of a TaskRenderer.
BasicZoomHandler Basic mouse handler for controlling the zoom level of a Gantt chart.
Example An example of creating a Gantt chart and using its basic features.
GanttChart A Gantt chart swing component.
GanttChartUndoableEdit An UndoableEdit for recording changes made to a GanttChart and providing the means to undo such changes.
GanttHeader Header marking years, months, weeks, days and hours along the length of a GanttChart.
GanttModel Model storing the collection of tasks displayed in the Gantt chart.
GanttModelEvent Event object representing changes to a GanttModel.
GanttPanel A Swing component for displaying a GanttChart, GanttHeader and GanttTable.
GanttSelectionEvent Event object representing selection events in a Gantt chart.
GanttTable A JTable to be displayed alongside a GanttChart.
Link Represents an individual link between two tasks.
LinkModel Model storing the collection of links on a Gantt chart.
State Immutable class for storing the original position of the tasks being manipulated by this editor.
TextUtilities Provides lightweight plain text rendering methods.
Translator Translator to extract the necessary Gantt chart details from a user-defined task.
 

Enum Summary
LinkType Enumeration of link types.
 

Package dgantt Description

A simple yet powerful library for creating Gantt charts. This library provides basic implementations of the necessary renderers and listeners to create an interactive Gantt chart, while making available all the necessary hooks to create highly customized charts. See the Example file for a demonstration of the basic features.
